Segment.name: BVB
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of the Vehicle Baying Order Transaction Set

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: BayTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of vehicle parking pattern

Field.name: CapacityQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the method of determining vehicle storage facility capacity

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either BVB05 or BVB06 is present, then the other is required.
